TopicTitle: Up-Goer Five Text Editor: Find out what this is describing!

Articles.Content:
The Other, bad fighting-with-the-people-who-made-the-Up-goer-Five Type of people's Space-car that puts it-self together with the really big space city in the ring around the world has three parts.

The first one is the people box. It has chairs and windows and people in it. It has a thing on it that keeps it safe from the fire when the people box hits the tiny part of the air really high up until it gets to the bigger part of the air lower down. Then clothes-type stuff on it (the same type that the people who fall from the sky have in a back-pack to slow them down) comes out and slows the people box down and it lands on the ground near home.

Above it is the ball-type thing that has a ring on it that puts it-self together with the space city. It can have people in it, but only when the space-car is in space. The people then go into the space-city when the space-car is put together with the Space-City. It is thrown away after the People-Box goes down home.

The one under the People-Box has weird wet air in it for burning, and other weird air that burns when it touches the other air. There are things on it that takes the weird air and burns it and moves the Space-Car. There are also lots of really tiny things just like that that turn the Space-Car. It is also thrown away when the People-Box goes down home.

The people who made this type of Space-Car (There were others) were not happy with and racing with the people who made the type of Space-Car that went to the other world and back. The people who made the Space-Car we were talking about also put the first ball in a ring around the world, the first person in space, and the first person in a ring around the world.

A big long stick with fire at the bottom of it, with other Fire-Sticks on the side, put the Space-Cars into Space.

The Space-Car that went to the other world used a lot of really big fire sticks on top of each other. That was the Up-Goer Five.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Upgoer-Five Text Editor

http://splasho.com/upgoer5/

Try to find out, and post a picture, of what I'm describing. Then make your own description of a spacecraft or space-related-thing using the Upgoer Five text editor, and someone else will have to post a picture of what they are describing.

The one and only! And now for my one(this is HARD). The people who once made that lander thing that broke also wanted to go to the dark place with no air. But they didn't have an up goer to get there. This up goer flies like a side goer but then keeps side going but also up a bit until it gets to the dark place with no air. It has different funny up goer push things (which up goer 5 had 5 of) that eat air but only sometimes because when there is no air they don't. They are point-like but only sometimes. When they are in the place with no air they are not point-like. It was made by the people who fought the people who went to the place where up goer 5 was made and made it for those people a long time ago but now they are all friends. It can carry heavy stuff to the place with no air and then land like a side goer.

Correct!

Is it the Skylon ?

Or maybe the venture star?

Correct! Is it skylon? Or maybe the venture star?
Skylon Indeed! Writing that was HARD. At first I though 'Oh yeah,piece of cake' then It got longer, how are engines not in the 10,000 most used words? So it was rather vague.
Ah, Skylon, should've guess. I Hope that things going over well...

ResurectingNecroing this.

The old friend of the other-world space car is really small. It is black and has a window. It got to space using a really small fire-stick and it has three really tiny fire things on the back. It went up into space and then back down into the air.

What's this?

I'm different
i seen the xkcd, i know

This Space-Car was sometimes carried to space by the Up-Goer Five. It made the space people able to do much more when they got to space, but cost lots and lots of money and didn't even have any fire thingies of its own. Space people kept breaking parts of it, but they could always fix those parts and didn't have to go home early because of that. It ran on batteries like your car uses, but a lot more of them. It held two space people, it only worked in space, and only in one place in space, and it didn't come back to Earth. It didn't even have a door!
Lunar rover.

This was made after the Up-Goer five went to another world. Although it was supposed to be a huge space thing, the people who made the Up-Goer Five did not get the money and so, it was stuck at being a idea, not a real space thing. It would have used lots of Up-Goer Fives though.

However, one part of it had the head of the people that made Up-Goer Five interested. He look through all the plan, and fell in love with that one part, which was the only thing to be built.

Here's a tough one.

This was a special big space-car that was like the second type of space-cars that went to space. But this space-car had two parts. Two people would be in the top part as the space-car went to space and when it came back from space, but the two people would not go to the bottom part until the space-car was in space. The bottom part was bigger and had more things in it. This space-car never became a real space thing, but it was a good idea and a new Up-Goer was made just for the space-car.

This was made after the Up-Goer five went to another world. Although it was supposed to be a huge space thing, the people who made the Up-Goer Five did not get the money and so, it was stuck at being a idea, not a real space thing. It would have used lots of Up-Goer Fives though.

However, one part of it had the head of the people that made Up-Goer Five interested. He look through all the plan, and fell in love with that one part, which was the only thing to be built.

Apollo Applications Program, the only result of which was Skylab.

Here's a tough one.

This was a special big space-car that was like the second type of space-cars that went to space. But this space-car had two parts. Two people would be in the top part as the space-car went to space and when it came back from space, but the two people would not go to the bottom part until the space-car was in space. The bottom part was bigger and had more things in it. This space-car never became a real space thing, but it was a good idea and a new Up-Goer was made just for the space-car.

Sounds like Gemini B with the Manned Orbital Laboratory.

Sounds like Gemini B with the Manned Orbital Laboratory.

It was the Intergrated Manned Program, which would've ramped up Saturn V acivity before putting a shuttle system in place.

Nixon didn't like most of it, but loved the shuttle and space base part.

And that, my friends, is the birth of the STS and ISS.
